qas.question: What is Lionel Messi's goal total in all competitions?
How many players on the Barelona team have scored over 100 goals?
What is Messi's total goal scores in official competitions?
How many goals has Messi scored in La Liga competitions?
Who is the next highest goal scorer after Mess?

context: FC Barcelona's all-time highest goalscorer in all competitions (including friendlies) is Lionel Messi with <a0_0>474<a0_0/> goals. Messi is also the all-time highest goalscorer for Barcelona in all official competitions, excluding friendlies, with <a2_0>445<a2_0/> goals. He is the record goalscorer for Barcelona in European (82 goals) and international club competitions (90 goals), and the record league scorer with <a3_0>305<a3_0/> goals in La Liga. <a1_0>Four<a1_0/> players have managed to score over 100 league goals at Barcelona: Lionel Messi (305), <a4_0>César Rodríguez<a4_0/> (192), László Kubala (131) and Samuel Eto'o (108).
